uk.ac.standrews.fsainterpreter.representation

Class FSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.standrews.fsainterpreter.representation.FSA

  • public class FSA
extends java.lang.Object
    Finite state automate contains accepted and not accepted states This class has methods that adds state to list, checks that the given state is already exist in list. It also returns the state by giving a number of it.
    Author:
    cs2001 student
